evidence.claim: Centricity AI utilizes AWS for cloud operations.
The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations in their documentation.
Integration with HL7 and FHIR standards is highlighted in their health tech solutions.
X12 transaction sets, including 837 for healthcare claims, are supported in their integration workflow.
They have features focusing on API integration patterns for seamless health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Focused on HIPAA compliance and API integrations indicates alignment with X12 transactions.
